sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdepim include kaddressbook, kalarm, kandy, karm, kgpgcertmanager, kmail, knode, knotes, konsolekalendar, kontact korganizer, korn and kpilot.

sect3.title: kaddressbook
sect3.para: kaddressbook is the KDE address book.

sect3.title: kalarm
sect3.para: kalarm is a system to provide reminder messages.

sect3.title: kandy
sect3.para: kandy is a program to synchronize mobile phone numbers.

sect3.title: karm
sect3.para: karm is a personal time tracker.

sect3.title: kgpgcertmanager
sect3.para: kgpgcertmanager is a tool for managing X509 certificates.

sect3.title: knotes
sect3.para: knotes is a popup notes utility.

sect3.title: konsolekalendar
sect3.para: konsolekalendar is a command line interface to KDE calendars.

sect3.title: kontact
sect3.para: kontact is the integrated solution to personal information management (PIM) needs.

sect3.title: korganizer
sect3.para: korganizer is a personal calendar/todo system.

sect3.title: korn
sect3.para: korn is a KDE mail checker that has the capabilities to dock itself to kicker.

sect3.title: kpilot
sect3.para: kpilot is a program to synchronize a Palm-Pilot.
